4.name: Sister Loretta Maize
4.backstory:
Sister Isabella's journey to becoming a cleric of the Order of Sea and Stone began after a profound encounter with an elemental force during her childhood. This encounter awakened her connection to the divine energies of water and earth, leading her to join the order and dedicate herself to the service of these elements.

Sister Isabella's pursuit of knowledge and understanding can sometimes make her distant and detached from the emotions and concerns of others. She can be absorbed in her own thoughts and overlook the immediate needs of those around her. Sister Isabella's thirst for knowledge can also lead her to become overly curious and tempted by forbidden secrets, risking the delicate balance she seeks to uphold

Sister Isabella possesses an innate talent for manipulating the elemental forces, a power that extends beyond the limits of what is traditionally taught within the order. Fearing the repercussions of her unconventional abilities being discovered, she keeps this hidden, practicing in secret and struggling with the desire to fully embrace her unique gift while remaining loyal to the teachings of the order.

5.name: Lucius Blackthorne
5.desc: Tall and thin, Lucius has very sharp features and a youthful glow underneath his dark bushy hair and beady eyes.
5.backstory:
Lucius Blackthorn has always possessed an inquisitive mind and a natural talent for investigation. Raised in a respectable family of means in Rueside. He dreamed of joining the Silk Guard as an investigator, utilizing his sharp reasoning to apprehend criminals.

Lucius family had secretly been involved with the abolitionists, and when Lucius discovered the proof, he saw an opportunity. At 15 he took the evidence to the Silk Guard, hoping it would prove his dedication and loyalties.

While few know that Lucius was behind the fall of the Blackthorn's, he still feels he did the right thing. The fact that he was appointed to a guard position in the Silk Guard was a little disappointing, but he knew he would work his way up.

12 years later he has one week left as a town guard before becoming an inquisitor for the House of Silk.

6.name: Brother Aldric
6.backstory:
Brother Aldric is known for his gentle, but apathetic nature. He is devoted to his faith and the teachings of the Order, but seeks comfort above all else. He seeks peaceful resolutions whenever possible, but less out of a desire for peace than wanting to take the easiest path.

Brother Aldric's apathy can sometimes lead to him being taken advantage of or manipulated by others. It is challenging for him to assert himself or make difficult decisions that may be necessary because he cannot muster up the concern.

7.name: Andrei Malring
7.desc: Tall, thin, bald, and bearded, Andre dresses in fine, sometimes ostentatious clothing, with a penchant for wearing shiny baubles.
7.backstory:
Born to a poor farming family, not wealthy enough to own slaves, Andrei grew up working long days in the fields and making dangerous journeys into town to sell his family's produce. More than once, he and his father had to abandon the wagon to bandits. What little free time Andrei had would be spent fishing at the nearby Rue River. 

At 15, while exploring a wooded area, Andrei stumbled on one of the Stone Gates, guarded by several Sentrys. Never able to resist something mysterious, snuck through the brush to get a closer look. He could feel the buzzing of the stone as he reached out from his hiding spot to touch the carved runes lining the edges.

Scenes of great destruction began flashing through his mind. As the vision continued, he was flying over farmland and forests, careening through white clouds. He passed golden fields of wheat and green pastures of grazing animals. When he glanced back,the world had all vanished into black, as though he was erasing the existence itself wherever he went.

A sentry noticed him and shoved himaway from the gate, breaking his contact with it. He opened his eyes, shaking in terror, not at the Sentry with his sword drawn in his face, at the something he felt watching at him through the Gate. While the Sentry's warned him to stay away, Andrei gathered himself, then made his way back to his family's farm. 

Although he felt he had only been gone for several hours, his family explained that he had been missing for days. When he tried to explain what he saw in his vision, he was dismissed as the fantasies of a young boy. Andrei became obsessed with Gates, learning anything he could. He would sneak off to local temples and booksellers, investigating every hint of the Gates he could find. Eventually, Andrei discovered the existence of the *Order of Sea and Stone* and the role of the Gates in Coia's past.

When he abandoned the family farm to join the Order, his parents did not understand. "We'll starve without your help working the farm," they insisted; however, Andrei believed that nothing was more important than the Gates, not even his family. When he left, he knew how unlikely it was he would ever see his family again.

After joining the order, his determiniation and aptitude quickly gained the notice of the highest ranking members of the order. At 40, he became the youngest person to ever gain the position of High Cleric, a lifetime appointment.

His continued blind devotion to preserving the stone portals at all cost, and fear of losing his position stand in direct opposition to his actions working behind the scenes to help the Unchained.

8.name: Ellurei
8.desc:
Elven with silver hair.
Green eyes that exude menace.
Has a quick and nervous edge to movements
8.backstory: Ellurei was raised among the high elves, educated in the sacred libraries, yet was always an outsider due to their rebellious tendencies. Ellurei was not satisfied with their predetermined life and desired freedom. When their parents planned an arranged marriage for Ellurei, they ran away into the wild, surviving by cunning, theft, and deception. Ellurei now lives in the Rue Salt Marshes, preying upon those he can ensnare in a cunning trick or simply overpower.

9.name: Eldathra
9.desc: Eldathra has a dignified presence about her complete with her striking silver hair that cascades to her waist and mesmerizing jade green eyes. Her skin is as pale as moonlight, contrasting with the elegant dark emerald robe she wears. Despite her age, she retains her youthful elvish vigor and her face remains unlined, sporting a permanent smile of wisdom and knowledge.
9.backstory: Eldathra was once an esteemed scholar in the grand Elven libraries of Lorenthil. She dedicated her life to the pursuit of knowledge, gaining respect among her peers for her wisdom and creative approach to understanding the world. Her imaginative interpretations of ancient texts often led her to make discoveries that eluded others. This all changed when she found an unassuming citrus-colored stone, which she later learned was the legendary Soul-Eater gem. This gem secretly had the power to extend the user's life at the expense of consuming the souls around it. Unbeknownst to Eldathra, her lifespan started wildly increasing while those around her started to age rapidly and die. Realizing what she had unwittingly been causing, she chooses to isolate herself to prevent further harm.

10.name: Nemrissa
10.desc:
Nemrissa is of average height with long silver hair that she often ties in a loose braid. Her eyes are an unusual shade of violet that seems to change hues with her mood..
She carries a magical staff carved with ancient elvish runes that she is fond of using when casting her spells..
Despite her age, Nemrissa has the youthful gait and energy of someone half her age, a surprising perk of her half-elf lineage.
10.backstory: Nemrissa lived a rather unexceptional life in her small village, working as a humble potter. However, everything changed when she discovered an ancient manuscript hidden in an old pot she found while digging up clay for her pottery. The manuscript revealed that she was a descendant of an ancient elven wizard and was destined to inherit his magical powers. However, the path to unveiling her destiny required honesty, a trait that Nemrissa had often struggled with due to her natural cunning and wit. The real twist though? The manuscript was not of her lineage at all but a test by a hidden wizard guild who wanted to find individuals who overcame their weaknesses for an unexpected fellowship. When she finally discovered this, she struggled between revealing her dishonest past or withholding the truth to join the guild.

11.name: Elara Vaneir
11.desc:
slender.
graceful.
has vibrant, almond-shaped green eyes.
long, wavy auburn hair
11.backstory: Elara is a young elf from a noble family in the sylvan city of Leuthilspar. Despite the comfort and safety of her life, she has always been driven by a thirst for adventure. However, she hides a secret that could bring her world crashing down around her: she is not a true-born member of her family. She was actually found as a baby in the wreckage of a caravan, the only survivor of a goblin raid. Her real heritage is unknown.
11.occupation: Apprentice to the city's Master Thief
inventory: a silver locket with a mysterious emblem
a small pouch of gold pieces
